details.author: APJ Abdul Kalam
details.about: An Autobiography of APJ Abdul Kalam, former President of India. Dr. Kalam examines his early life, effort, hardship, fortitude, luck and chance that eventually led him to lead Indian space research, nuclear and missile programs.

details.author: Stephen Hawking
details.about: A Brief History of Time: From the Big Bang to Black Holes is a book on theoretical cosmology by English physicist Stephen Hawking.
